name: HeyGen
description: HeyGen integration for AI avatar generation, video creation, and photo avatar management

generate_photo_avatar.description: Generate AI photos for photo avatar development with customizable attributes

name.description: Avatar Name - Name to assign to the generated avatar

age.description: Age - Age group for the avatar's appearance. Must be exactly one of: 'Young Adult' (18-30), 'Early Middle Age' (30-45), 'Late Middle Age' (45-60), 'Senior' (60+), or 'Unspecified'

gender.description: Gender - Gender identity of the avatar. Must be exactly one of: 'Woman' (not 'female'), 'Man' (not 'male'), or 'Unspecified'. Use exact capitalization

ethnicity.description: Ethnicity - Ethnic background for facial and skin tone characteristics. Must be exactly one of the listed values with exact capitalization (e.g., 'White' not 'white', 'East Asian' not 'asian')

orientation.description: Orientation - Image orientation for the generated avatar

pose.description: Pose - Framing or body coverage in the avatar. Must be exactly one of: 'half_body' (waist up), 'close_up' (head and shoulders), or 'full_body' (entire body). Note: use 'half_body' not 'upper_body'

style.description: Style - Visual or artistic style of the generated avatar. Must be exactly one of the listed values with exact capitalization (e.g., 'Cinematic' not 'cinematic', 'Realistic' not 'realistic')

appearance.description: Appearance - Text prompt describing the avatar's appearance, such as clothing, mood, lighting, etc. Maximum 1000 characters

callback_url.description: Callback URL - Optional: URL to notify when generation is complete

callback_id.description: Callback ID - Optional: Custom ID for callback tracking

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

data.description: Response Data

check_generation_status.description: Check the status of a photo or look generation request

generation_id.description: Generation ID - The generation ID returned from generate_photo_avatar or generate_avatar_look

error.description: Error - Displays error message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

id.description: Unique identifier of the generated avatar/look

status.description: Current status of the generated avatar or look (e.g., 'in_progress', 'completed', 'failed')

msg.description: Legacy field for messages. This field is deprecated

image_url_list.description: URLs of the generated avatars/looks. Null when generation is still in progress

image_key_list.description: Image keys corresponding to the generated avatars/looks. Null when generation is still in progress

data.description: Response Data - Contains detailed information about the generated avatar/look; null if request fails

create_avatar_group.description: Create an avatar group by grouping photos of the same subject

name.description: Group Name - Name of the avatar group

image_key.description: Image Key - Image key of the AI-generated avatar/uploaded photo. For AI-generated photos, retrieve from Check Photo/Look Generation Status endpoint. For user-uploaded photos, retrieve from Upload Asset endpoint

generation_id.description: Generation ID - Optional: Unique identifier of the AI-generated avatar. Can be retrieved from Generate Photo Avatar Photos endpoint. Applies only to AI-generated avatars

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

data.description: Response Data

add_looks_to_group.description: Add additional looks to an existing avatar group (max 4 per request)

group_id.description: Group ID - Unique identifier of the avatar group to which the new looks will be added. Can be retrieved from the Create Photo Avatar Group endpoint

image_keys.description: Image Keys - Image key(s) of the AI-generated avatar(s)/uploaded photo(s) to add to the avatar group. For AI-generated avatars, retrieve from Check Photo/Look Generation Status endpoint. For user-uploaded photos, retrieve from Upload Asset endpoint. Maximum 4 images at a time

name.description: Look Name - Name of the look

generation_id.description: Generation ID - Optional: Unique identifier of the AI-generated avatar. Can be retrieved from Generate Photo Avatar Photos endpoint. Applies only to AI avatar photos

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

data.description: Response Data

train_avatar_group.description: Train an avatar group to recognize the subject's unique features using machine learning

group_id.description: Group ID - Avatar group ID to train

error.description: Error

data.description: Training Data
Response Data

check_training_status.description: Check the status of an avatar group training job

group_id.description: Group ID - Avatar group ID being trained

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

status.description: Training Status - Current status of the training job (e.g., 'ready', 'pending', 'processing', 'failed')

error_msg.description: Error Message - Error message if training failed; null if successful

created_at.description: Created At - Unix timestamp when the training job was created

updated_at.description: Updated At - Unix timestamp when the training job was last updated

data.description: Response Data - Contains training job status and timestamps

generate_avatar_look.description: Generate new appearance variations for a trained avatar group

group_id.description: Group ID - Unique identifier of the avatar group to which the new look will be added. Can be retrieved from the Create Photo Avatar Group endpoint

prompt.description: Prompt - Text prompt describing the look's appearance, such as clothing, mood, lighting, etc. Maximum 1000 characters

orientation.description: Orientation - Image orientation for the generated look

pose.description: Pose - Framing or body coverage in the look

style.description: Style - Visual or artistic style of the generated look

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

data.description: Response Data

add_motion_to_avatar.description: Add animated effects to a static photo avatar

id.description: Avatar ID - Unique identifier of the avatar/look. For avatars, this ID can be retrieved from Create Photo Avatar Group endpoint. For looks, this ID can be retrieved from Add Looks to Photo Avatar Group endpoint

prompt.description: Prompt - Optional: Text prompt describing the avatar's movement or desired animation. Used to guide motion generation

motion_type.description: Motion Type - Optional: Motion engine to use for adding movement. Defaults to 'consistent'

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

id.description: Motion Avatar/Look ID - Unique identifier of the generated motion avatar/look

data.description: Response Data - Contains the motion avatar/look ID

add_sound_effect_to_avatar.description: Attach audio enhancements to an avatar

id.description: Motion Avatar/Look ID - Unique identifier of the motion avatar/look. Can be retrieved from Add Motion endpoint

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

code.description: Status Code - Status code indicating the result of the API request. A 100 indicates a successful response

sound_effect_id.description: Sound Effect ID - Unique identifier of the sound effect

data.description: Sound Effect Data - Contains the ID of the sound effect

msg.description: Message (Deprecated) - Legacy field for messages. This field is deprecated

message.description: Message - Contains human-readable messages explaining the status of the request. In case of errors, it returns an explanation

data.description: Response Data - Contains the main response data

list_avatar_groups.description: List all photo avatar groups in the account with pagination support

page.description: Page - Optional: Page number for pagination (starts at 1)

limit.description: Limit - Optional: Number of results per page (default: 10, max: 50)

include_public.description: Include Public - Optional: Whether to include all public avatar groups. Defaults to false

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

avatar_groups.description: Avatar Groups - List of all photo avatar groups

total.description: Total Count - Total number of avatar groups

data.description: Response Data - Contains list of avatar groups with pagination info

list_avatars_in_group.description: List all avatars/looks within a specific avatar group

group_id.description: Group ID - Unique identifier of the avatar group. Can be retrieved from List Avatar Groups or Create Avatar Group endpoint

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

avatars.description: Avatars - List of all avatars/looks in the group

data.description: Response Data - Contains group info and list of avatars

get_avatar_details.description: Retrieve comprehensive information about a specific video avatar (public/studio avatars)

avatar_id.description: Avatar ID - Unique identifier of the avatar from list_avatars

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

data.description: Avatar Details

get_photo_avatar_details.description: Retrieve comprehensive information about a specific photo avatar/talking photo

id.description: Avatar/Look ID - Unique identifier of the avatar/look. For avatars, this ID can be retrieved from Create Photo Avatar Group endpoint. For looks, this ID can be retrieved from Add Looks to Photo Avatar Group endpoint

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

created_at.description: Created At - Unix timestamp when the avatar/look was created

status.description: Status - Processing status (e.g., pending, in_appeal, moderation_rejected)

is_motion.description: Is Motion - Whether the avatar/look is animated

business_type.description: Business Type - Origin of the avatar/look (e.g., generated or uploaded)

moderation_msg.description: Moderation Message - Provides reason if avatar is rejected, suspended, or pending review

data.description: Avatar Information - Contains detailed information about avatar/look

list_voices.description: List all available voices for text-to-speech with their IDs, names, languages, and characteristics

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

voice_id.description: Voice ID - Unique identifier for the voice

display_name.description: Display Name - Human-readable name of the voice

emotion_support.description: Emotion Support - Whether this voice supports emotions

multilingual.description: Multilingual - Whether this voice supports multiple languages

voices.description: Voices - List of all available voices

data.description: Response Data - Contains list of voices

list_voice_locales.description: List all available locales/accents for multilingual voices

voice_id.description: Voice ID - Optional: Get locales for a specific voice. If not provided, returns all available locales

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

locale.description: Locale Code - Language and region code (e.g., en-US, en-GB, pt-BR)

data.description: Response Data - Contains list of locales

list_avatars.description: List all available avatars in the account with pagination support

page.description: Page - Optional: Page number for pagination

limit.description: Limit - Optional: Number of results per page

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

premium.description: Premium - Indicates whether the avatar is a premium avatar or not (account-specific)

avatars.description: Avatars - A collection of available avatar objects

talking_photos.description: Talking Photos - A collection of available talking photo objects

data.description: Response Data - Contains the list of avatars and talking photos

create_avatar_video.description: Create a video using an avatar with text-to-speech or audio input. Supports multiple scenes with customizable character, voice, background, and text elements

character.description: Character - Could be an avatar or talking photo (photo avatar)

voice.description: Voice - Could be text (TTS), audio, or silence

background.description: Background - Optional: Could be color, image, or video

text.description: Text - Optional: Text overlay displayed on screen

video_inputs.description: Video Inputs (Scenes) - Array of video input settings (scenes). Must contain between 1 to 50 items. Each scene describes the avatar, background, voice, and script. See HeyGen API docs for full nested structure: character object requires 'type' (avatar/talking_photo) and 'avatar_id' or 'talking_photo_id'. Voice object requires 'type' (text/audio/silence), and for text type: 'voice_id' and 'input_text' are required

title.description: Video Title - Title of this video

caption.description: Enable Captions - Whether to enable captions in the video. Only supported for text-based input. Default: false

width.description: Width - Width of the output video. Default: 1280

height.description: Height - Height of the output video. Default: 720

dimension.description: Video Dimensions - Custom dimensions for the output video. Default: {width: 1280, height: 720}

folder_id.description: Folder ID - Unique identifier of the folder where the video is stored. Can be retrieved from List Folders or Create Folder endpoint

callback_id.description: Callback ID - Custom ID for callback purposes. Returned in the status/webhook payload for tracking

callback_url.description: Callback URL - URL to notify when video rendering is complete. Using a webhook endpoint is recommended. If both webhook and callback_url are used, events will be sent to both endpoints

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

data.description: Response Data

create_photo_avatar_video.description: Generate an Avatar IV video from a photo avatar with text-to-speech or audio. Requires image_key, video_title, and either (script + voice_id) OR (audio_url/audio_asset_id)

image_key.description: Image Key - Image key of the uploaded photo to use. Can be retrieved from the Upload Asset endpoint or Check Photo/Look Generation Status endpoint

video_title.description: Video Title - Title of the generated video

script.description: Script - Text that the avatar will speak in the generated video. Either script along with voice_id, or audio_url/audio_asset_id must be provided

voice_id.description: Voice ID - Unique identifier of the voice. Can be retrieved from List All Voices (V2) endpoint. Either script along with voice_id, or audio_url/audio_asset_id must be provided

video_orientation.description: Video Orientation - Orientation of the output video. Can be 'portrait' or 'landscape'. Defaults to 'portrait'

fit.description: Fit - Choose how avatar fits to the screen. Can be 'cover' or 'contain'

custom_motion_prompt.description: Custom Motion Prompt - Text prompt describing the avatar's motion style

enhance_custom_motion_prompt.description: Enhance Custom Motion Prompt - Whether to use AI to enhance the avatar's motion based on a text description you provided in custom_motion_prompt

audio_url.description: Audio URL - URL of the uploaded audio. Can be retrieved from Upload Asset endpoint. Either audio_url or audio_asset_id must be provided in case script and voice_id are not provided

audio_asset_id.description: Audio Asset ID - Unique identifier of the uploaded audio. Can be retrieved from Upload Asset endpoint. Either audio_url or audio_asset_id must be provided in case script and voice_id are not provided

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

data.description: Response Data

get_video_status.description: Check the status of a video generation request and get the video URL when complete

video_id.description: Video ID - Video generation request ID

error.description: Error - Error object with code and message when the request fails; null if the request is successful

status.description: Video Status - Values: pending, in_progress, complete, failed

video_url.description: Video URL - Available when status is 'complete', null otherwise

thumbnail_url.description: Thumbnail URL - Available when status is 'complete', null otherwise

duration.description: Duration - Video duration in seconds, available when complete

created_at.description: Created At - Unix timestamp when video generation started

error.description: Error - Error details if status is 'failed'

data.description: Response Data
